Name: Havana Cobbler
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lime twist or wedge.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Nutrition: One serving of Havana Cobbler contains 216 calories
